Instrumentation Calibration and Maintenance Standards
Introduction
Regular calibration and maintenance underpin the accuracy and reliability of refinery instrumentation. This document establishes procedures and intervals for calibrating instruments, managing spares and documenting maintenance activities.
Applicable Standards
API 551 – Instrument Calibration.
ISO 10012 – Measurement Management Systems.
MIL‑STD‑45662A / ISO 17025: calibration system requirements.
ISA RP 12.6.01: maintenance and testing of fire & gas detectors.
Calibration Equipment
Pressure calibrators: deadweight testers, pressure pumps and electronic calibrators with NIST‑traceable accuracy.
Temperature calibrators: dry‑block calibrators, fluid baths, reference RTDs and thermocouples.
Flow calibrators: primary standards (provers), portable ultrasonic or Coriolis calibrators.
Electrical loop calibrators: simulate and measure 4–20 mA signals, voltage and resistance.
